channel.title: MLB on Dawg & Hen
channel.description: Recent content in MLB on Dawg & Hen

item.title: Aroldis Chapman's New Money Pitch
item.description: Aroldis Chapman, the elite closer of the New York Yankees is well-known as 100 mph fastball and a hard slider. He has been seeking his 3rd pitch type and finally seems to succeed in adding a new pitch type. He threw the splitters 3 times (out of 199 ) last season. From the animated pics, Chapman’s usage of the splitters are over 10% this season. (Currently, 13.3%) Click the thumbnail image to go to the full video clip on YouTube, which includes 27 splitters and the pitch results this season, MLB 2021.
